turns.content:
The other three girls looked at each other, excited by the idea. "That sounds like so much fun!" Zara exclaimed.

Nara nodded in agreement. "I'm definitely down for that. It'll be fun to see Lizzie in different outfits."

Lumina smiled. "I'm in too. Let's start measuring Lizzie's body and ordering some outfits right away."

The girls quickly got to work, measuring Lizzie's bust, waist, hips, inseam, and other important measurements. They then began browsing different clothing websites, ordering a variety of outfits for Lizzie to try on the next day. They made sure to order a mix of sexy lingerie and other outfits, as long as Lizzie got to stay barefoot.

The girls were excited for the next day, when they would get to see Lizzie try on all the different outfits they had picked out for her. They couldn't wait to see how Lizzie looked in each one, and they were sure that Lizzie would have a blast trying on all the different clothes.

the next day, the girls got up, ate breakfast, and then collected the outfits. they had ordered plenty, and had boxes upon boxes of outfits. they decided to go with one of Alyssa's first, since Alyssa was the one who suggested the idea.

Lizzie took the box, and stepped behind the folding shoji screen Alyssa had set up for her to change behind.

(Prompt: have the outfit be a cute and sexy, black & white, authentic French maid dress uniform, and have Nara, Zara, and Lumina ask what the outfit is, and make note of how sexy and cute it is and how her bare feet add a touch of innocence to the look. leave a Segway to the next outfit at the end of the prompt, but don't show the next outfit, or pick who's outfit she wears next. remember, Lizzie stay's completely barefoot no matter what, no shoes, no socks, no nothing, and have Nara, Zara, and Lumina ask what the outfit is, having never seen a maid dress before, and ask if the outfit has any cultural significance.)

Lizzie stepped out from behind the screen, wearing the French maid dress. The dress was made of a black and white striped fabric, with a white apron and a black skirt. The top of the dress had a white collar and cuffs, with black ribbon trim. The dress had a tight bodice that accentuated her small waist, and the skirt flared out, ending just above her knees, showing off her bare legs and feet.

Nara, Zara, and Lumina all stared at Lizzie in awe. "Wow

Lizzie was handed a box by Zara, and then retreated behind the screen again. as she did, Alyssa explained that due to how hybrid's feet have an unnatural durability that allows hybrids to be barefoot everywhere. hybrids can't do any permanent damage to their feet. For instance, If one stepped on something sharp, it'd hurt for a moment or two, but it wouldn't be able to break the skin, so their feet couldn't be cut, or damaged, in any way. due to this, they prefer to be barefoot no matter what.

as she explained that, Lizzie stepped out from behind the screen in Zara's outfit. It was a beautiful, traditional Farisian outfit, made of soft, silky fabrics in shades of orange and gold. The outfit consisted of a long, flowing skirt that reached down to her ankles, and a matching top that was adorned with intricate embroidery and beading. The top had a low cut neckline, and had a long, flowing cape that draped down her back. On her head, she wore a delicate, gold-plated headpiece that was adorned with small, sparkling jewels.

Lizzie did a little twirl, and the way her bare feet, and adorable toes peeked out from under the skirt was just too cute.

(do not skip any further, just leave a Segway to the next outfit at the end of the prompt, but don't skip over anything.)

The girls all oohed and ahhed at Lizzie's new outfit, admiring the intricate details and the way it flowed so beautifully on her. "Wow, Zara, this is beautiful!" Alyssa exclaimed. "I've never seen anything like it before."

"It's a traditional Farisian outfit," Zara explained, "It's usually worn by young women during special occasions or celebrations."

"It's so pretty," Lizzie said, twirling again. "I love how it flows and how the beading and embroidery are so intricate."

"It's perfect for you, Lizzie," Nara said. "It brings out your feline features and your bare feet add a touch of innocence to the look."

The girls continued to admire Lizzie's outfit, and as they did, Alyssa suggested that they move on to the next one. "Alright, who's outfit is next?" she asked, as Lizzie retreated behind the screen again.

(Leave a segway to the next outfit but don't show the next outfit, or pick who's outfit she wears next.)

Lizzie collected a box from Nara, and retreated behind the screen. her kitty tail wagging and her ears perked up.
(show the current outfit, but Leave a segway to the next outfit at the end of the prompt, but don't show the next outfit, or pick who's outfit she wears next, and don't skip over anything, and remember, lizzie must stay barefoot.)

As Lizzie changed into the next outfit, the girls couldn't help but be excited to see what Nara had picked out for her. After a few moments, Lizzie stepped out from behind the screen, and the girls were amazed at what they saw.

Nara had picked out a traditional Naxlith outfit for Lizzie, and it looked amazing on her. The outfit was made of soft, breathable fabrics in shades of deep blue and purple. It consisted of a form-fitting bodysuit that hugged her curves perfectly, and had intricate tribal designs embroidered on it. On her arms and legs, she wore matching arm and leg warmers that reached up to her elbows and knees. The outfit also had a hooded cloak that draped down her back, and had a long, flowing tail that was attached to the back of the bodysuit.

Lizzie looked like a fierce warrior princess, and the way her bare feet peeked out from under the outfit added a touch of vulnerability to her fierce appearance. The girls couldn't wait to see what the next outfit would be.

Lizzie collected an outfit from Lumina. due to Lumina's species being amphibious, they wondered what it would look like. Alyssa was hoping for some sort of sexy swimming-themed outfit. she could only imagine the beautiful, belly exposing clothes she'd seen in pictures of glimmers under the water, and felt excited. she couldn't wait to see lizzie's soft, ticklish, flat tummy.

Lizzie stepped out from behind the screen in Lumina's outfit. It was a beautiful, shiny, metallic bikini, with a top that had a deep v-neck and straps that criss-crossed at the back. The bottoms were a thong style, and the whole thing was made of a shimmery, iridescent fabric that seemed to change color depending on how the light hit it. Lizzie had a matching headpiece, which was a circlet of the same iridescent fabric, with a small, glittering gem in the center.

The girls all oohed and aahed at the outfit, and Lizzie did a little twirl, showing off her bare feet, which looked even more perfect and ticklish than before.

"Wow, Lizzie, you look amazing!" Alyssa exclaimed. "I can't wait to see what the next outfit is!"

(Leave a segway to the next outfit at the end of the prompt, but don't show the next outfit, or pick who's outfit she wears next, and don't skip over anything, and remember, Lizzie must stay barefoot.)
